column4: hi I got a ? about memory the system monitor says i am using 185MB out of  600MB. i got 640MB of ram 32MB shared for vidio.I open a terminal run top i get 590MB used +/- 22MB +/- free why the discrepency?
cache most likely.
Also some memory is locked away in the kernel.
ur right i got 284 +/- cached
free -mt usually makes the numbers add up (more correctly) iirc

i foget what i dled but my screesaver is really awsome than the default gnome xsreensaver i dled mostly libs.
elaborate on that
on what?
You can run a screen saver in the root window (desktop window) of X, however metacity or nautilus comandeer the root window and show their own (in this case not so nice) graphics there.
If you try other windowmanagers that don't comandeer that window you can run /usr/lib/xscreensaver/glmatrix -root to put it in the root window for added eye candy points with the lads.
There shoul (as in ought to be) a way to have metacity or nautilus release the root window so you could do that very same thing in gnome.
I just don't know how.
That good enough? :)
i do my best work when i'm drunk get nice results just cab't remember how
Cheers then!
